name: Trial of Temptation
summary:
Tales tell of the mythical Shrine of Fate, which resides at the bottom of the Steps of Determination, leading towards the Gong of Truth. However, those tales also describe a harrowing trial for any who approach the Shrine. 
Today, our main protagonist Ping Pe arrives at the Shrine, which he previously believed to be just some myth. Take control and uncover the secrets of this mysterious place.
